data.eml:eml: Notes on the genus Parastasia Westwood (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae) from China, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Ming-Zhi (2019): Notes on the genus Parastasia Westwood (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae) from China, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4613 (2): 240-250, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4613.2.2
